title: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems
description: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems this is in red text.
OB: Currently, when the default location checkbox is unchecked, the content of the edit box is cleared. The text color is red and there is no validation error icon.
EB: The default location should remain in the edit box even if the default location checkbox is unchecked. The text color should be black and the validation error icon should be displayed when there is an error.
